title: Kirepapa.
synopsis: Chisato Takatsukasa, a 35-year-old author, has such a youthful appearance that anyone would think him to be in his early twenties. His work is inspired by his idolâ€”the best-selling mystery author Saki Shunka, who is as much of an enigma herself as the plots of the books she writes.
